decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The hereby approved details for visibility splays, cycle parking and car park management shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details submitted contained within TSP/HFC/P2810/04 Rev B, received: 9th March 2016, Car Park Management Plan, received: 3rd November 2016 and Broxap Sheffield stand details, Received 3rd November 2016 prior to first occupation of the site and shall be permanently retained as such unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 2 - The details of cycle parking hereby approved shall provide no less than 20 cycle spaces and shall be permanetly retained as such.
description: Details of visibility splays, traffic management plan, cycle parking submitted pursuant to conditions 11, 12, & 14 of planning permission 00507/Y/P2 dated 16/10/2015 for the erection of clubhouse, covered standing area and seating area with provision of football pitches and associated parking
